name: serverless-pagespeed-monitoring
description: Puppeteer on AWS Lambda for monitoring pagespeed

scripts.package: npm run package-prepare && npm run copy-source && npm run install-deps && npm run copy-chrome && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.install-deps: cp package.json ./dist && cd dist && PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=1 npm install --production
scripts.package-prepare: npm run lint && rm -fr dist && rm -fr package.zip
